attributes.action: make all foreign registered cars used by resident working foreigners to register their vehiclesand pay UK road tax
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I would like the government to force all resident foreign workers living in the UK and driving cars that are still registered in the country of origin to be re-registered in the UK and to pay the going rate of UK Vehicle excise duty. I know of a fair few in this area of the west country
